de.hshl.obj.wavefront

Class Arguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.wavefront.Arguments
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>

    public final class Arguments
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>
    Will split the String by whitespace and return every separated element as argument. Represents a single line inside an *.obj or *.mtl resource. Grants simplified access to the arguments of a line, checking for errors and automatically throwing a DecodingException if required. This class enables lazy evaluation, by reading only the '#' of a comment line and ignoring the rest of the line, instead of splitting the whole line first and then ignoring it.
    Author:
    Johannes Vollmer
